data.title: Crooked I (KXNG Crooked) Inks Partnership With Start Up Tech Company
data.meta_description: News From Hip Hop To Hollywood! www.thehypemagazine.com
data.text:
Headquartered in Detroit, MI New technology startup Emrgnt Technologies, LLC has reached an agreement with Shady Records and Slaughterhouse artist Crooked I (Kxng Crooked) as well as rising artists MRK SX and J. IRJA for the company’s launch of The Plugs which will provide consumers with a variety of stylish wireless audio products.

Be The Plug with the release of their first wireless earbuds, LB-313. They provide high-quality sound and features CVC 6.0 Noise Cancellation. Ideal for any environment, the wireless earbuds are extremely comfortable to wear. Additionally, the LB-313 earbuds feature Bluetooth 5.0 Realtek Chipset for the strongest signal without any disruption or delay within distances up to 50 feet. They also offer a powerful 6-hour battery life and can obtain a full charge, up to 4 times, before having to charge its charging case.

Emrgnt Technologies LLC CEO and Founder LaBront Askew says, “The Plugs brand is excited and honored to be partnering with an artist and global brand such as Crooked I. He’s a living legend and icon.” The company is also excited to partner with up and coming musical artists MRK SX and J. IRJA for its launch. MRK SX has worked with legends such as Royce Da 5 9, Crooked I, Yukmouth, Obie Trice, and D-12 to name a few. J. IRJA has worked with acts such as Caskey, Twista, Rittz, Gorilla Zoe, and Paul Wall. LaBront Askew states “He’s excited about partnering with MRK SX and J. IRJA because of their extreme talent as artists and work ethic are second to none.” MRK SX and J. IRJA talents are highlighted on The Plugs Soundtrack which features exclusive music featuring Crooked I, MRK SX, J. IRJA, Swifty McVay of D-12, and others.

The Plugs will provide nothing but the best in quality, sound, and design for its wireless audio products. The LB-313 wireless earbuds are just the beginning. Key initiatives and strategic partnerships will help steer the company into the future. Currently, we are taking presale orders. Quantities are limited so get your Plugs ordered now at www.gettheplugs.com

Source: Emrgnt Technologies LLC

About the Author

Dr. Jerry Doby Editor-in-Chief of The Hype Magazine, Media and SEO Consultant, Journalist, Ph.D. and retired combat vet. 2023 recipient of The President's Lifetime Achievement Award. Partner at THM Media Group. Member of the U.S. Department of Arts and Culture, the United States Press Agency and ForbesBLK.
